con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="admissionsApplicationService_V1" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:documentation>The following web service contract should be used to submit Admissions applications and applicants to UCL.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <schema targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <include schemaLocation="../registryws/xsd/admissionsApplicationsService_v1.xsd"/> </schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AdmissionsApplicationResponse_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:AdmissionsApplicationResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:ExtendedFaultDtl" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplication_v1_0"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest_v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AdmissionsApplicationResponse_v1_0"/> <wsdl:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" message="tns:FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicant_v1_0"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest_v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0" type="tns:admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplication_v1_0"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <soap:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicant_v1_0"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <soap:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0" name="admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0"> <!--Note: Spring WS is configured to override the location attribute of the soap:address element during application deployment; that will reflect the name of the machine where the services run--> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/registryws/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--This schema definition describes types to be used for UCL applications--> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/"> <!--SCHEMA INCLUDE SECTION--> <xs:include schemaLocation="registryData_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <!--***************************************************************** Request types *****************************************************************--> <element name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="application" type="v1_0:applicationTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="applicant" type="v1_0:applicantTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <!--***************************************************************** Response types *****************************************************************--> <element name="AdmissionsApplicationResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="reference" type="v1_0:referenceTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ExtendedFaultDtl"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="faultDtl" type="uclBasic_v1_0:errorInfoTp"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <!--********************************************************************************* Response reference type that includes an identifier for applicant and application **********************************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="referenceTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Identifier that identifies the application created--> <xs:element name="applicationID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Identifier that identifies the applicant created--> <xs:element name="applicantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--This schema definition describes generic types that can be used in UCL web services--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo>v1.0: Common types to be used across services. v1.1: Added error info type. This type may be included to add detail to any SOAP Fault. v1.2: Added person type. v1.3: Renamed person type, made elements optional. v1.4: Added passportTp, employerTp, appointmentTp, languageTp, countryTp, domicileTp, nationalityTp, disabilityTp, ethnicityTp, professionalAssociationTp</xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <!--Name type--> <xs:complexType name="nameTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="surname" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="forename1" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="forename2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="forename3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="knownAs" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Gender Type--> <xs:simpleType name="genderTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Email Type--> <xs:simpleType name="emailTp"> <xs:union> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+)*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value=""/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:union> </xs:simpleType> <!--UPI type--> <xs:simpleType name="upiTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="7"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Address type--> <xs:complexType name="addressTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="addressLine1" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="addressLine2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="addressLine3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="addressLine4" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="addressLine5" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="postCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="country" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Error information type code:- Generic error code for the user to interpret (e.g: 001, 002..) message:- Error message (e.g: Business validation failure message) referenceCode:- Application specific error messages that could be matched against errors thrown on the server side code(e.g:ERR123456) additionalInfo :- Stacktrace--> <xs:complexType name="errorInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="referenceCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="additionalInfo" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Basic Person type--> <xs:complexType name="personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="upi" type="uclBasic_v1_0:upiTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="mainUserID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="fullName" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="mainEmail" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="sex" type="uclBasic_v1_0:genderTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="exDirectory" type="xs:boolean" default="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Passport--> <xs:complexType name="passportTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="number" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="issueDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="expiryDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="placeOfIssue" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Employer--> <xs:complexType name="employerTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Appointment--> <xs:complexType name="appointmentTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="employer" type="uclBasic_v1_0:employerTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="jobTitle" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="endDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="responsibilities" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Language: ISO codes for languages--> <xs:complexType name="languageTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Country: Only ISO codes allowed--> <xs:complexType name="countryTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--All types below may or may not have international or country specific codes, as a standard we allow only names. The service will be responsible to derive the codes are appropriate.--> <!--Domicile--> <xs:complexType name="domicileTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Nationality--> <xs:complexType name="nationalityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Disability--> <xs:complexType name="disabilityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Ethnicity--> <xs:complexType name="ethnicityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Professional associations a person/entity could be associated with--> <xs:complexType name="professionalAssociationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="referenceNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="validFrom" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="validUntil" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="additionalDetails" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:regBasic_v1="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo>v1.0: First version released with types associated with student personal data, course information and related applications v1.1: Added types associated with information associated with a student's academic application when submitted to UCL</xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" schemaLocation="registryBasicTypes_v1.xsd"/> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--***************************************************************** Types defined in v1.0 start Types modelled for student and applicant person and course details. These types are used to publish information about a student and applicant
*****************************************************************--> <!--Decision Response Type--> <xs:complexType name="decisionResponseTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="decision" type="regBasic_v1:decisionCodesTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="decisionDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="studResponse" type="regBasic_v1:responseCodesTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="studResponseDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Admissions Decision and response type--> <xs:complexType name="admissionsdecRespTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--These elements correspond to the UCL decision and student response code against each of the 2 stages--> <xs:element name="stage1" type="v1_0:decisionResponseTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="stage2" type="v1_0:decisionResponseTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Final decision and response, the concatenation of decision and response codes--> <xs:element name="decResp" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Course Related Information--> <xs:complexType name="courseInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="courseCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="graduateFlag" type="regBasic_v1:graduateFlagTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--MS: Changed to affiliateFlag from affliateFlag--> <xs:element name="affiliateFlag" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Student on an intercalated course Changed from intercalaterFlag to intercalater and changed datatype to regBasic_v1:intercalatedTp from Boolean--> <xs:element name="intercalater" type="regBasic_v1:intercalatedTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseBlockBeginDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseBlockEndDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="routeCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--e.g: BA European Social and Political Studies--> <xs:element name="routeName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--e.g: Bachelor of Arts--> <xs:element name="awardName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Returners: A returning student would be a student who is on a continuation of their course at UCL--> <xs:element name="returner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Finalist: Students is on their final year of the course--> <xs:element name="finalist" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Course Enrolment Information--> <xs:complexType name="courseEnrolmentTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="courseBlock" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="expectedNxtBlock" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="dateEnroled" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="yearEnroled" type="xs:gYear" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="enrolmentstatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Student Course Details--> <xs:complexType name="studentCourseTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ucasNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applicantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseInfo" type="v1_0:courseInfoTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="modeofAttendance" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="hesacourseStartDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseExpectedEndDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--This is the date student left college. Changed name from courseEndDt to studentTerminationDt--> <xs:element name="studentTerminationDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseEnrolmentDetails" type="v1_0:courseEnrolmentTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="studentPersonalDetailsTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="uclBasic_v1_0:personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="studentCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="dob" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Changed name from emails to studentEmailAccts studentPersonalDetailsTp will not hold a value for mainEmail for the base type--> <xs:element name="studentEmailAccts" type="regBasic_v1:studentEmailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="nationality" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="domicile" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="homeAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Changed name from contactAddress to emergency contact address--> <xs:element name="emergencyContactAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="nextofKin" type="regBasic_v1:nextofKinTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Debtor flag against the student--> <xs:element name="debtFlag" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Fee status--> <xs:element name="feeStatus" type="regBasic_v1:feeStatusTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="applicantDetailsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="entryMethod" type="regBasic_v1:entryMethodTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="ucasNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applicantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applicationFormNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="sequenceNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="entryYear" type="xs:gYear" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseInfo" type="v1_0:courseInfoTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="modeofAttendance" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--MS: Change type from string to decisionResponseTp--> <xs:element name="institutionResponse" type="v1_0:admissionsdecRespTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseAppCreateDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="courseAppBeginDt" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="clearingFlag" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applicationStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="studentInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="personalDtls" type="v1_0:studentPersonalDetailsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="currYearAcademicDtls" type="v1_0:studentCourseTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applicantDtls" type="v1_0:applicantDetailsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Types defined in v1.0 end *****************************************************************--> <!--***************************************************************** Types defined in v1.1 start *****************************************************************--> <!--***************************************************************** Source of Interest: Sources of interest in Registry captures where an applicant has heard about UCL *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="sourceOfInterestTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Qualification examples: BA, BSc, MA, B.Eng etc *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="qualificationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** English language types *****************************************************************--> <!--Qualifications in English language--> <xs:simpleType name="qualificationsinEnglishTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="IELTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="TOEFL"/> <xs:enumeration value="OTHER"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Language band score--> <xs:simpleType name="languageBandScoreTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OVERALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="READING"/> <xs:enumeration value="WRITING"/> <xs:enumeration value="SPEAKING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LISTENING"/> <xs:enumeration value="ESSAY"/> <xs:enumeration value="OTHER"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--English language score--> <xs:complexType name="englishLanguageScoreTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Values allowed: READING, WRITING, SPEAKING, LISTENING, ESSAY, OVERALL, OTHER--> <xs:element name="name" type="v1_0:languageBandScoreTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Score label when name is OTHER--> <xs:element name="otherLanguageBand" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Actual score against the name--> <xs:element name="score" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--English Language exam details--> <xs:complexType name="englishLanguageTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Values expected are : TOEFL, IELTS or OTHER--> <xs:element name="languageExam" type="v1_0:qualificationsinEnglishTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--If the value in languageExam is OTHER then specify the name of the other English exam--> <xs:element name="otherLanguageExam" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Internet or paper based etc. Required for TOEFL.--> <xs:element name="method" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="dateTaken" type="xs:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="languageScore" type="v1_0:englishLanguageScoreTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="additionalDetails" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--English Language qualification list--> <xs:complexType name="englishLanguageQualificationDetailsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="englishLanguageQualification" type="v1_0:englishLanguageTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Mode of attendance modeofattendanceTp.code is UCL's student record data system defined mode of attendance code. HESA defined codes are not sufficient. UCL allows additional modes than HESA.-> *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="modeofattendanceTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Programme and its occurrence *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="programmeTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="modeOfAttendance" type="v1_0:modeofattendanceTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--A programme occurrence is essential to identify a programme uniquely in Registry--> <xs:complexType name="programmeOccurrenceTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="v1_0:programmeTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--This is the identifier in SITS, which is essential to identify a programme in Student records system.--> <xs:element name="identifier" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="academicYear" type="xs:gYear" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="endDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Institutions *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="institutionTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="country" type="uclBasic_v1_0:countryTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Referee *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="refereeTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="position" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="refereeListTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="referee" type="v1_0:refereeTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Qualifications associated with an application *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="qualificationsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="institution" type="v1_0:institutionTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="endDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="qualification" type="v1_0:qualificationTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="grade" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="mainSubject" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="languageOfInstruction" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="qualificationDetailsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="qualificationDetail" type="v1_0:qualificationsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Appointments/Employment details *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="employmentDetailsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="employer" type="uclBasic_v1_0:appointmentTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Funding available for application Scholarship available for application *****************************************************************--> <xs:simpleType name="fundingTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Self"/> <xs:enumeration value="Loan"/> <xs:enumeration value="Employer"/> <xs:enumeration value="Sponsorship"/> <xs:enumeration value="Other"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="fundingsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="funding" type="v1_0:fundingTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Scholarship or Studentship--> <xs:complexType name="scholarshipTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="awardName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="awardValue" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="awardDuration" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="awardStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="scholarshipsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="scholarship" type="v1_0:scholarshipTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Course application *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="courseApplicationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <!--UCL's application identifier. This identifier will is expected to identify an applicant uniquely. Note: Registry's TRAN process is where de-duplication of applicants takes place, after which an applicant identifier is assigned. TRAN happens much later in the process from when applicants submit their application. This identifier will either hold Registry defined applicant id or a unique identifier that can be used to identify applications submitted by the same person. This in SITS system can also be the user code.--> <xs:element name="uclApplicationID" type="xs:string"/> <!--Application id if the application is submitted by an external system--> <xs:element name="externalApplicationID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:choice> <!--Programme includes the programme and its occurrence. Both together identify the programme in SITS--> <xs:element name="programme" type="v1_0:programmeOccurrenceTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="startMonth" type="xs:gMonth" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="supervisorName" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="personalStatement" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="interviewAvailability" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="fundings" type="v1_0:fundingsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--If funding takes a value of Other then details about which other funding set against otherFunding--> <xs:element name="otherFunding" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="scholarships" type="v1_0:scholarshipsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="sourcesOfInterest" type="v1_0:sourceOfInterestTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--If sources of interest takes a value of Other then details about which other source of interest--> <xs:element name="otherSourceofInterest" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--ATAS statement--> <xs:element name="atasStatement" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--IP address for the person who submitted the application--> <xs:element name="ipAddress" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Application creation date--> <xs:element name="creationDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Application status--> <xs:element name="applicationStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Recommended decision: R=> Rejected C=> Conditional or any other--> <xs:element name="departmentalDecision" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Recommended offer conditions, this can hold details if the application is Accepted conditionally--> <xs:element name="departmentalOfferConditions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Details about the referees' associated with the application--> <xs:element name="refereeList" type="v1_0:refereeListTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Registry person type. *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="registryPersonTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="uclBasic_v1_0:personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="dateOfBirth" type="xs:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="nationality" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nationalityTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="secondaryNationality" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nationalityTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="countryOfDomicile" type="uclBasic_v1_0:domicileTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="countryOfBirth" type="uclBasic_v1_0:countryTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="passport" type="uclBasic_v1_0:passportTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="visaRequired" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" default="false"/> <xs:element name="disability" type="uclBasic_v1_0:disabilityTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="ethnicity" type="uclBasic_v1_0:ethnicityTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="professionalAssoc" type="uclBasic_v1_0:professionalAssociationTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="homeAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="correspondenceAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="criminalConvictions" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" default="false"/> <xs:element name="criminalConvictionDetails" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="qualificationList" type="v1_0:qualificationDetailsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="englishIsFirstLanguage" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" default="true"/> <xs:element name="englishLanguageQualificationList" type="v1_0:englishLanguageQualificationDetailsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="employerList" type="v1_0:employmentDetailsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Registry applicant type. *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="applicantTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="v1_0:registryPersonTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Applicant identifier. If present it will be used to find the applicant in Student records system--> <xs:element name="applicantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** A application type, which is a collection of the applicant and the course application Source indicates the system where the application is created first. Applicant identifier is UCL student record system identifier for an applicant *****************************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="applicationTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Name for source system which calls the service to send the application Example: PRISM, UCL--> <xs:element name="source" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Details about the applicant--> <xs:element name="applicant" type="v1_0:applicantTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Details about the application--> <xs:element name="courseApplication" type="v1_0:courseApplicationTp" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--***************************************************************** Types defined in v1.1 end *****************************************************************--> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION END *********************************************--> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:regBasic_v1="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--v1.0: Common types moved from registryData_v1_0 to a separate XSD--> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <!--********************************************* SIMPLE TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--Graduate Level flag that indicates the level associated with the course. U = Under graduate course P = Post graduate course--> <xs:simpleType name="graduateFlagTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Entry method type U = UCAS applicants D = Direct applicants--> <xs:simpleType name="entryMethodTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Intercalater E = External intercalaters. Note:- These are students who come to UCL only for the intercalated course U = UCL intercalaters Note:- These are students who are study in UCL for the main degree as well the intercalated course--> <xs:simpleType name="intercalatedTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Fee Status H = Home O = Overseas--> <xs:simpleType name="feeStatusTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="O"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--UCL decision codes against a course application U => Unconditional R => Rejected C => Conditional--> <xs:simpleType name="decisionCodesTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Student response codes against a course application I => Insurance D => Declined F => Firmly accepted--> <xs:simpleType name="responseCodesTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--********************************************* SIMPLE TYPES SECTION END *********************************************--> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--Student Email ids--> <xs:complexType name="studentEmailTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--MS:Changed type name from homeEmailID to personalEmailID--> <xs:element name="personalEmailID" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="institutionEmailID" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Contact Details that encapsulates Address and telephone numbers.--> <xs:complexType name="contactDtlsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="addressDtls" type="uclBasic_v1_0:addressTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Can be used if a system does not distinguish between different types of telephone numbers. They are stored just as contact numbers--> <xs:element name="telephoneNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="email" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Systems most time need to store the telephone details in exact fields and having a list of values of type string does not help in determining accurately where they need to be stored If we implement an order logic as 1st element is Home, 2nd is Work that may always work. Given that we cannot conclusively enumerate all the telephone types having individual elements is better--> <xs:element name="landline" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="work" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="mobile" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="fax" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Next of Kin Information--> <xs:complexType name="nextofKinTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="relationship" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="name" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="address" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="email" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:stud="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" <!--Optional:--> <ucl:upi>?</ucl:upi> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:mainUserID>?</ucl:mainUserID> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:fullName> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:title>?</ucl:title> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:surname>?</ucl:surname> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:forename1>?</ucl:forename1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:forename2>?</ucl:forename2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:forename3>?</ucl:forename3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:knownAs>?</ucl:knownAs> </ucl:fullName> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:mainEmail>?</ucl:mainEmail> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:sex>?</ucl:sex> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:exDirectory>false</ucl:exDirectory> <stud:dateOfBirth>?</stud:dateOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <stud:nationality> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:nationality> <!--Optional:--> <stud:secondaryNationality> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:secondaryNationality> <!--Optional:--> <stud:countryOfDomicile> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:countryOfDomicile> <!--Optional:--> <stud:countryOfBirth> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:countryOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <stud:passport> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:number>?</ucl:number> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:issueDate>?</ucl:issueDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:expiryDate>?</ucl:expiryDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:placeOfIssue>?</ucl:placeOfIssue> </stud:passport> <!--Optional:--> <stud:visaRequired>false</stud:visaRequired> <!--Optional:--> <stud:disability> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:disability> <!--Optional:--> <stud:ethnicity> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:ethnicity> <!--Optional:--> <stud:professionalAssoc> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:referenceNo>?</ucl:referenceNo> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validFrom>?</ucl:validFrom> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validUntil>?</ucl:validUntil> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:additionalDetails>?</ucl:additionalDetails> </stud:professionalAssoc> <stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine3>?</ucl:addressLine3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine4>?</ucl:addressLine4> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine5>?</ucl:addressLine5> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:postCode>?</ucl:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:country>?</ucl:country> </bas:addressDtls> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:telephoneNo>?</bas:telephoneNo> <!--Optional:--> <bas:email>?</bas:email> <!--Optional:--> <bas:landline>?</bas:landline> <!--Optional:--> <bas:work>?</bas:work> <!--Optional:--> <bas:mobile>?</bas:mobile> <!--Optional:--> <bas:fax>?</bas:fax> </stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <stud:correspondenceAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine3>?</ucl:addressLine3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine4>?</ucl:addressLine4> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine5>?</ucl:addressLine5> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:postCode>?</ucl:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:country>?</ucl:country> </bas:addressDtls> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:telephoneNo>?</bas:telephoneNo> <!--Optional:--> <bas:email>?</bas:email> <!--Optional:--> <bas:landline>?</bas:landline> <!--Optional:--> <bas:work>?</bas:work> <!--Optional:--> <bas:mobile>?</bas:mobile> <!--Optional:--> <bas:fax>?</bas:fax> </stud:correspondenceAddress> <!--Optional:--> <stud:criminalConvictions>false</stud:criminalConvictions> <!--Optional:--> <stud:criminalConvictionDetails>?</stud:criminalConvictionDetails> <!--Optional:--> <stud:qualificationList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <stud:qualificationDetail> <!--Optional:--> <stud:institution> <stud:code>?</stud:code> <!--Optional:--> <stud:name>?</stud:name> <stud:country> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:country> </stud:institution> <!--Optional:--> <stud:startDate>?</stud:startDate> <!--Optional:--> <stud:endDate>?</stud:endDate> <!--Optional:--> <stud:qualification> <stud:code>?</stud:code> <!--Optional:--> <stud:name>?</stud:name> </stud:qualification> <!--Optional:--> <stud:grade>?</stud:grade> <!--Optional:--> <stud:mainSubject>?</stud:mainSubject> <!--Optional:--> <stud:languageOfInstruction>?</stud:languageOfInstruction> </stud:qualificationDetail> </stud:qualificationList> <!--Optional:--> <stud:englishIsFirstLanguage>true</stud:englishIsFirstLanguage> <!--Optional:--> <stud:englishLanguageQualificationList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <stud:englishLanguageQualification> <stud:languageExam>?</stud:languageExam> <!--Optional:--> <stud:otherLanguageExam>?</stud:otherLanguageExam> <!--Optional:--> <stud:method>?</stud:method> <stud:dateTaken>?</stud:dateTaken> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <stud:languageScore> <stud:name>?</stud:name> <!--Optional:--> <stud:otherLanguageBand>?</stud:otherLanguageBand> <stud:score>?</stud:score> </stud:languageScore> <!--Optional:--> <stud:additionalDetails>?</stud:additionalDetails> </stud:englishLanguageQualification> </stud:englishLanguageQualificationList> <!--Optional:--> <stud:employerList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <stud:employer> <ucl:employer> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </ucl:employer> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:jobTitle>?</ucl:jobTitle> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:startDate>?</ucl:startDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:endDate>?</ucl:endDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:responsibilities>?</ucl:responsibilities> </stud:employer> </stud:employerList> <!--Optional:--> <stud:applicantID>?</stud:applicantID> </stud:applicant> </stud:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<stud:source>?</stud:source> <stud:applicant> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:upi>?</ucl:upi> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:mainUserID>?</ucl:mainUserID> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:fullName> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:title>?</ucl:title> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:surname>?</ucl:surname> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:forename1>?</ucl:forename1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:forename2>?</ucl:forename2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:exDirectory>false</ucl:exDirectory> <stud:dateOfBirth>?</stud:dateOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <stud:nationality> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:nationality> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:expiryDate>?</ucl:expiryDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:placeOfIssue>?</ucl:placeOfIssue> </stud:passport> <!--Optional:--> <stud:visaRequired>false</stud:visaRequired> <!--Optional:--> <stud:disability> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:disability> <!--Optional:--> <stud:ethnicity> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:ethnicity> <!--Optional:--> <stud:professionalAssoc> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:referenceNo>?</ucl:referenceNo> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validFrom>?</ucl:validFrom> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validUntil>?</ucl:validUntil> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:additionalDetails>?</ucl:additionalDetails> </stud:professionalAssoc> <stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine3>?</ucl:addressLine3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine4>?</ucl:addressLine4> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine5>?</ucl:addressLine5> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:postCode>?</ucl:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:country>?</ucl:country> </bas:addressDtls> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:telephoneNo>?</bas:telephoneNo> <!--Optional:--> <bas:email>?</bas:email> <!--Optional:--> <bas:landline>?</bas:landline> <!--Optional:--> <bas:work>?</bas:work> <!--Optional:--> <bas:mobile>?</bas:mobile> <!--Optional:--> <bas:fax>?</bas:fax> </stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <stud:correspondenceAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:-->
